meta.description: Maximize the data flow from Station 0 to Station 8 in a network of 9 relay stations with given capacities.

sets.name: STATIONS
sets.description: Set of relay stations in the network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Data flow capacities between stations in terabytes per hour.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of data from one station to another in terabytes per hour.

objective.name: max_data_flow
objective.description: Maximize the data flow from Station 0 to Station 8.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Station 0 to Station 1 does not exceed capacity.
